# React Expense Report Application

This is a React application built with Vite, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS for managing expense reports for trail maintenance volunteers.

## Features

- Add expenses with PDF invoice attachments
- Add kilometer-based expenses with configurable rate
- Generate PDF expense reports
- Deployable to GitHub Pages
- Full TypeScript support for type safety
- Tailwind CSS v4 for modern, responsive styling

## Tech Stack

- React 19
- TypeScript
- Vite
- Tailwind CSS v4
- jsPDF for PDF generation
